issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: ObjectStore.getMTableColumnStatistics() should check if colNames is empty

comments.body: patch-1: Not sure what kind of query causes it but add the check for empty or null column names so it won't fail for such case.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12844123 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~aihuaxu] When the query ends up being "tableName == t1 && dbName == t2 && ()", we would want the query to be {{"tableName == t1 && dbName == t2}} right? so that should still return the stats for all columns in the table? With the patch, we just return when the column list is empty, so no table stats for that table are returned. 
What should the behavior be? Thanks
patch-2: minor change to add comment for the function.
From the directSQL implementation, we are returning NULL when columns are not provided.

Pushed to master. Thanks Naveen for reviewing.
